description:
In this course, you will learn the basic tools to navigate SAP system. Besides, you will have a free access to the academy private server for 48 hours. So you will become acquainted with SAPGUI, which is the SAP browser.

In this course, first we will learn the two ways to navigate SAP system. We will see how to set up the SAPGUI browser on a personal computer, this is the recommended option. Then, we will learn the other option to navigate system. We will see how to navigate SAP through a Web browser. In this particular case the SAPGUI set-up will not be necessary.

Second, we will learn the meaning of the technical data that our browser shows, as well as the SAP basic concepts as transaction codes and sessions. We will also learn to use the SAPGUI basic tools, the favorite’s management and the meaning of SAP messages to the users.

This was a general idea about this navigation course. Let’s start to explore the SAP world!
title: SAP Navigation Course - FREE SERVER access
